form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding the Sick Child>Feeding the Sick Child Two

field.name: After each illness, increase the frequency of breastfeeding for two weeks to help your child regain health and weight
When mother is sick, you can continue to breastfeed your child. You may need extra food and support during this time
For children who have started complimentary feeds, give more breastmilk for at least two weeks
